speaker: President.
english: President. The next item is the report by Mr Vidal-Quadras on behalf of the Committee on Industry, Research and Energy on energy efficiency (Green Paper) [ 2005/2210(INI) ] ( A6-0160/2006 ).
original: President. The next item is the report by Mr Vidal-Quadras on behalf of the Committee on Industry, Research and Energy on energy efficiency (Green Paper) [ 2005/2210(INI) ] ( A6-0160/2006 ).
